description:
when using nova.sh to install, the python-novaclient package is not installed, which as per https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/735295 is now a requirement.
Running nova components results in an error stating "ImportError: No module named novaclient".
Installing the package resolves the problem.

Edit: python-suds also requires an apt-get, otherwise nova-compute fails with "Inner Exception: No module named suds"

Tested on revno: 886
title: nova.sh doesn't apt-get install python-novaclient
